ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They probably can t think of any way to not have an npc bard be a pushover in combat. :) -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Nov 23/99, James Schuldes <jgs@...> wrote:
>
> p.s.s. is it just me or how come Verant has such a low opinion of bards?
> They design dungeons and populate them with these mobs: knights, warriors,
> shamen, wizards, enchanters, etc. so where do they put the bards? Hello a
> Sylly are you [interested] in helping deliver some [mail]?

They probably can't think of any way to not have an npc bard be a
pushover in combat. :)

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
